Package main

Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Shop
  • public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
    Shop is a shop that players can buy and sell items to. Has a name and a List of Items that can be bought, and a modifier that sets the percentage of an Item's base price it is sold for.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shop​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Item> galacticMedItems)
      Initialises a Shop object that sells items in a given inventory.
      Shop​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Item> inventory, double buyModifier, double sellModifier)
      Initialises a Shop that sells items in a given inventory with buy and sell price modifiers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int buyItem​(Item item)
      buys an Item and adds it to the shop's inventory.
      int getBuyPrice​(Item item)
      gets the price the Shop will buy an Item for.
      java.util.List<Item> getInventory()
      returns the Shop's inventory of Items.
      java.lang.String getName()
      returns the Shop's name.

      gets the price the Shop will sell an Item for.
      int sellItem​(Item item)

      • Shop

        public Shop​(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.List<Item> galacticMedItems)
        Initialises a Shop object that sells items in a given inventory.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to give the Shop
        galacticMedItems - the inventory for the shop to sell items from

      • Shop

        public Shop​(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.List<Item> inventory,
            double buyModifier,
            double sellModifier)
        Initialises a Shop that sells items in a given inventory with buy and sell price modifiers.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to give the Shop
        inventory - List of items for the shop to sell items from
        buyModifier - the fraction of an item's value the shop will buy it for
        sellModifier - the fraction of an item's value the shop will sell it for
